Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2010 05:26PM InMontreal wrote: Bought tighter-than-normal  cotton t-shirts with lycra in them (on sale for under $10).  Wear one or two at a time depending on the amount of support needed.  The silk sounds comfortable.
